A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I legitimately feel depressed after waiting two years to see this film.  I have spent the last two weeks of my life marathoning every single Star Wars film\, including the prequels\, to psyche myself up for this.  

I've been a fan of Star Wars for the past 21 years of my life\, and this movie took a big steaming shit over everything I love about the franchise (including episode 7).

Character motivations are out of wack.  A plot twist makes two of the characters entire plotline obsolete halfway through the movie.  All of the charm of Rey and Finn are missing\, and the menacing yet innocent spark of Kylo Ren has all but faded.

I truly grew to love these characters in TFA...and I feel this movie does not do them justice.  

And Rian Johnson's interpretation of 'the force' is anime bullshit.  

I can only hope the short 5 month wait for Solo will be worth it to wash the taste of this film out of my mouth.
